definitions.definition: ( mining ) A site for mining stone , limestone , or slate .
examples: Michelangelo personally quarried marble from the world-famous quarry at Carrara .

main_definition: ( mining ) A site for mining stone , limestone , or slate .

definitions.definition: ( uncountable , obsolete ) A part of the entrails of a hunted animal , given to the hounds as a reward .
( uncountable ) An animal , often a bird or mammal , which is hunted .
( countable ) An object of search or pursuit .

main_definition: ( uncountable , obsolete ) A part of the entrails of a hunted animal , given to the hounds as a reward .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) An animal , often a bird or mammal , which is hunted .
( countable ) An object of search or pursuit .

definitions.definition: A diamond -shaped tile or pane , often of glass or stone .

main_definition: A diamond -shaped tile or pane , often of glass or stone .
